snippet: With a limping recovery and a well-funded Republican campaign, much of the country was less enthusiastic about Barack Obama than it was in 2008. But the Democratic coalition’s strength can be seen despite the red shift toward Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: With a limping recovery and a well-funded Republican campaign, much of the country was less enthusiastic about Barack Obama than it was in 2008. But the Democratic coalition’s strength can be seen despite the red shift toward Mitt Romney.

headline.seo: Counties Blue and Red, Moving Right and Left
headline.main: Counties Blue and Red, Moving Right and Left
